= ZINBA Installation =

Here you will find instructions to install the Zinba software package into  <a href="http://cran.r-project.org/" >R</a>.  It is assumed that you already have R installed.  

== Linux ==
Open a terminal and follow the step-by step instructions, or copy and paste the block of commands below into a terminal to automate the installation process.

{{{
wget http://zinba.googlecode.com/files/zinba_2.0.tar.gz
tar -xzvf zinba_2.0.tar.gz
R CMD INSTALL zinba
R
install.packages(c('multicore','doMC','foreach','qvalue','quantreg')) 
library(zinba)
}}}

Or follow the step-by-step instructions:
Step by step instructions:
  # Download the <a href="ZINBA_1.11.2.tar.gz" >ZINBA_1.11.2.tar.gz</a> package
  # Open a <u>terminal</u>, change to the directory that the package is located in, and unpack the Zinba folder using {{{tar -xzvf ZINBA_1.11.2.tar.gz}}}
  # Install the Zinba folder into R   
{{{R CMD INSTALL zinba}}}
  # Enter R, and then install packages Zinba is dependent on using {{{install.packages(c('multicore','doMC','foreach','qvalue','quantreg')) }}}
  # To load the Zinba functions in R, simply run
{{{library(zinba)}}}
